conversation.content: I need information about your commercial gym equipment lease financing options. What terms are available?

Good afternoon, and thank you for your interest in our equipment financing. We offer several flexible lease terms ranging from 24 to 60 months, with competitive rates starting at 4.9% APR for qualified businesses.
What documentation do I need to apply?

For our standard application process, you'll need your business tax ID, two years of financial statements, and a completed application form APP-2024-LEASE-7823. I can email that to you immediately if you'd like.
Yes, send it. What's the typical approval timeframe?
Certainly. Most applications receive preliminary approval within 24 to 48 hours, with final approval and funding completed within 5 business days of receiving all documentation.
I'm looking at approximately $75,000 in equipment. What would monthly payments look like?

For a $75,000 lease amount, assuming a 48-month term at our standard rate of 5.2%, your monthly payment would be approximately $1,735, though this can vary based on your credit profile and down payment options.
Do you require a down payment?

We offer both options. Our zero-down program is available for businesses with strong credit profiles, typically those with scores above 680, or you can reduce your monthly payment with 10% to 20% down through program FIN-FLEX-2024.
I have excellent credit. What additional benefits come with the zero-down option?

Excellent. With your strong credit profile, you'd qualify for our Premier Business package PRM-BUS-847, which includes zero down payment, potential rate reduction to 4.9%, and the ability to add equipment to your lease within the first 90 days.
Can I purchase the equipment at the end of the lease term?

Absolutely. All our leases include a purchase option at fair market value, typically 10% to 15% of original cost, or you can choose our $1 buyout lease option under agreement type LEASE-BO-001 for predetermined ownership.
What's the difference in monthly payments between those two options?

Of course. For your $75,000 lease, the fair market value option would be approximately $1,735 monthly, while the $1 buyout option runs about $1,890 monthly over 48 months, reference calculation ID CALC-75K-4824.
I'll take the application for the fair market value option. What's your email?
Perfect choice. I'll send the application to your email immediately. May I have your preferred email address and business name for our records?
It's mthompson@eliteperformancetraining.com. Elite Performance Training LLC.

Thank you. I've sent the application to your email along with reference number REF-EPT-112024-A. You should receive it within five minutes, and I'll follow up tomorrow to assist with any questions about the application process.
